div.p: [… and] Nemphe and [h]er husband, and the[…, and … …] … and [their] children and [… of the …] which Eni has made/done and which I had put on the rubbish heap. N[ow then … …] my weakling to her. I am writing to Theo[dore…] … beyond their … to me and instead of/to the place [… … I] knew that he was unable to receive it [… … t]o them. He has come. Send my [… to us … …] not eat. I am … […] …
[Give it] to Apa Taurine from Tkolothai Translation: M. Müller, P.Basel 2 67
